import React, { Component } from "react"; export default class Product extends Component{ state ={id:this.props.product.id,productName:this.props.product.productName} render() { return ( // receiving info from parent class to child class
Product #{this.props.id}
{this.props.productName}
${this.props.price}
{this.props.quantity}
{this.props.children}
) } }
